name: Cold Fog (LesliePhillips) (LesliePhillips) (LesliePhillips)
description:
A bizarre combination between Pac-Man and Horror, welcome to  Cold Fog! Collect the items, escape the enemy and always watch out for your timer! 

Features:

  • AAA-quality graphics with beautiful ambiance!
  • Original soundtrack.
  • AI with awesome effects that will hunt you to fulfill its bloodthirst!

    • Complete the objectives, find secret levels, and enjoy the game!
